bibl.title: A Particle of Greek Comedy.
bibl.note: Part of a speech in iambics from a play of Later Greek Comedy. Gurob (cartonnage), mid-/later third century B.C.

bibl.title: Studies in Honor of T.B.L. Webster. II

bibl.seg: Handley Eric Walter, A Particle of Greek Comedy.
J.H. Betts, J.T. Hooker and J.R. Green (Edd.), Studies in Honor of T.B.L. Webster. II (Bristol, 1988) pp. 51-55 et pl. 5.
